messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re:Gasaraki meanings
messages.msgSnippet: If you re really interested in Gasaraki and don t mind HEAVY spoilers go to fanfiction.net and check out Peter Elliott s fanfictions under Gasaraki. He just
messages.messageBody:
If you're really interested in Gasaraki and don't mind HEAVY spoilers go to
fanfiction.net and check out Peter Elliott's fanfictions under Gasaraki. He
just posted Chapter 4 of a good one which shows the whole series. His chaps
tend to run between 5 and 20 pages though. 4 is 17 pages long! Hope ya like
'em. And in NOIR check out the Perfect Blade which tells the story behind
the series. Major spoilers here too! See ya soon-K&K

>OK Hazu listen up!! MAJOR Spoilers in here. If ya intend to watch Ep
>25(final one) of Gasaraki DO NOT READ ANY FURTHER!! OK Gasaraki is the name
>of an ancient race of aliens who came to this planet millions of years ago,
>monkeyed around with life and discovered the secrets of eternity! Problem
>is
>until someone discovered what they already knew they could not pass on to
>the next level! The third son of the GOWAs discovered and wanted to exploit
>this secret. Problem was Papa was against it. So he had to go. No 3 shoots
>him as he is using the youngest GOWA the daughter as a Kai to awaken
>Gasaraki. Then a lot of junk about the end of civilization a la "Dr
>Strangelove's" final scenes. Then Yugi rescues his sister and Miharu but
>No.
>3 is taken! Want more? Watch it. Ja mata-K&K
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re:Gasaraki meanings
messages.msgSnippet: OK Hazu listen up!! MAJOR Spoilers in here. If ya intend to watch Ep 25(final one) of Gasaraki DO NOT READ ANY FURTHER!! OK Gasaraki is the name of an ancient
messages.messageBody:
OK Hazu listen up!! MAJOR Spoilers in here. If ya intend to watch Ep
25(final one) of Gasaraki DO NOT READ ANY FURTHER!! OK Gasaraki is the name
of an ancient race of aliens who came to this planet millions of years ago,
monkeyed around with life and discovered the secrets of eternity! Problem is
until someone discovered what they already knew they could not pass on to
the next level! The third son of the GOWAs discovered and wanted to exploit
this secret. Problem was Papa was against it. So he had to go. No 3 shoots
him as he is using the youngest GOWA the daughter as a Kai to awaken
Gasaraki. Then a lot of junk about the end of civilization a la "Dr
Strangelove's" final scenes. Then Yugi rescues his sister and Miharu but No.
3 is taken! Want more? Watch it. Ja mata-K&K

messages.subject: Re:Gasaraki meanings
messages.msgSnippet: OK We finally caught that segment in Ep 25 where the transliteral translation of ga sa ra ki is given. We just froze the screen there.
messages.messageBody:
OK We finally caught that segment in Ep 25 where the transliteral
translation of ga sa ra ki is given. We just froze the screen there.
Ga=desire/sa=people/ra=net/ki=spirit. Spoiler if we tell you the full
meaning of who or what gasaraki is. Gomen. Ja mata-K&K
